column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Thank you for your wonderful Yelp review!  On behalf of my staff and myself
column2: we sincerely thank you for taking the time to write this on Yelp.  Each month
column3: we will have a new appetizer/tapas and ramen so please do visit us again soon.  Seeing our guests happy and satisfied is our #1 goal!
